Package ui.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.drawing.DrawableSection
      • ui.input.selection.DrawableSelectableSection
        • ui.input.selection.SelectableGrid<SelectableSection,​BasicSectionComposer<SelectableSection>,​SelectableSection>
          • ui.game.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameHandler, PrintHandler, Section, EscapeHandler, SelectableSection, SelectionHandler
    public class Game
extends SelectableGrid<SelectableSection,​BasicSectionComposer<SelectableSection>,​SelectableSection>
implements GameHandler, EscapeHandler
    Represents the game area in the context of the UI.
    A selectable grid of sections built upon a SectionGrid. Sections can be moved between using the movement keys.
    Represents a selectable section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.

        terminalHandler - The TerminalHandler.
        enabled - Boolean; true if the game area is enabled for selection.
